translations: n.[生化] 加氧酶；[生化] 氧合酶

phrs.translation: 血红素氧化酶；血红素加氧酶

sentences.sentence: This article aims to summarize exercise and the skeletal muscle heme oxygenase system.
sentences.translation: 此研究拟对运动与骨骼肌血红素加氧酶系统作以综述。

sentences.sentence: Cyclo oxygenase compounds are found throughout the body - for example, in the nervous system and stomach.
sentences.translation: 环氧化合物的发现，整个机构-例如，在中枢神经系统和胃。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To study the expression of heme oxygenase 1 (HO 1) in the bronchis of rats with chronic col pulmonale.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究血红素氧化酶1 (HO 1)基因在慢性肺心病大鼠支气管中的表达及分布情况。
